series.title: Bas-Lag
series.notes: The editor suggests that reading The Scar first may be preferable to the official reading order of the series.

series.title: Bloodlines
series.notes: The Bloodlines series is immediately preceeded by the Vampire Academy series, which is set in the same universe.

series.title: Vampire Academy
series.notes: The Bloodlines series immediately follows Vampire Academy and is set in the same universe.

series.title: The Baroque Cycle
series.notes: The original 3 volumes of The Baroque Cycle listed above were also divided into multiple sub-volumes and sold as trade paperbacks under various titles. Cryptonomicon is loosely set in the same universe as the Baroque Cycle, and includes characters who are the descendants of those in the Baroque Cycle. It is a standalone work which may be read either before or after.

series.title: The Lord of the Rings
series.notes: The Hobbit and The Silmarillion are prequels which may be read before or after The Lord of the Rings series.
